summary: Eventbrite is a successful online ticketing site, built on half a million lines of Python, dating to before 2007. Python 3 shipped four years ago, and we're excited about all of its improvements. But what's it like to port 6 years and half a million lines to Python 3.3? Join me to learn about why we want to port, what the initial porting experiment revealed, and what the trouble areas are.
title: Porting Half a Million Lines to Python 3
